collectible.title: Cutest Golden Statue in the Skies
collectible.subtitle: Everything's coming up Cagliostro!
collectible.text: This statue is not a simple one of goldâ€”it was constructed with alchemy in the image of the founder of alchemy herself, with close attention to the details in her clothes and delicate face. One can say that portraying the epitome of cute to this degree is a form of initiation in itself.

collectible.title: Alchemist's Collar
collectible.subtitle: If Lost, Return to Cagliostro
collectible.text: A collar gifted to you by Cagliostro as proof of ownership. While she won't force you to wear it (yet), putting it on by your own discretion might indicate to your mistress that you're in need of some punishment...
collectible.unlock: Witness Cagliostro make fun of three small penises in one match. Make sure she's shown her true colors first.

collectible.title: Ouroboros
collectible.subtitle: The cycle of death and rebirth.
collectible.text: When Cagliostro was sealed away, so too was her staff. It contains the spirit of a magical serpent and is one of the many masterpieces created by this prodigious alchemist.
collectible.unlock: Have Cagliostro give a hands-on lesson to Sucrose. Cagliostro must finish before Sucrose starts, and they must be next to each other while Cagliostro is in her default costume.
